title: New Jersey Motor Vehicle Statutes (N.J.S.A. Title 39)
description: Key New Jersey Statutes Annotated traffic provisions for defense packet generation
disclaimer: This is informational only and not legal advice. Statutes may have been amended. Always verify current law.

speeding.title: Speed regulations
speeding.description: Establishes speed limits on New Jersey highways and roads
defensePoints: Calibration of speed measurement device (requires calibration within 5 days in NJ)
Road conditions at time of violation
speeding.typicalFine: 50-200+ depending on speed and location (plus court costs)
speeding.mandatoryCourtAppearance: Required for 20+ mph over limit in 65 mph zones or 25+ in other zones

recklessDriving.title: Reckless driving
recklessDriving.description: Operating a vehicle heedlessly in willful disregard of rights of others
defensePoints: Lack of willful or wanton conduct
recklessDriving.classification: Motor Vehicle Violation (not criminal in NJ)

carelessDriving.title: Careless driving
carelessDriving.description: Driving without due caution and circumspection

unsafeDriving.title: Unsafe driving statute
unsafeDriving.description: Plea option that avoids points with surcharge
defensePoints: May be offered as plea bargain from more serious charge
Limited to two uses per five years
unsafeDriving.note: Commonly used plea bargain option in NJ

suspendedLicense.title: Driving while license suspended
suspendedLicense.description: Operating a vehicle with a suspended, revoked, or cancelled license

noInsurance.title: Failure to maintain liability insurance
noInsurance.description: Operating a vehicle without required liability insurance
defensePoints: Proof of coverage at time of stop
Insurance lapse was brief and unintentional

improperLaneChange.title: Traffic on marked lanes
improperLaneChange.description: Requirements for safe lane changes and passing

failureToYield.title: Right of way at intersections
failureToYield.description: Requirements for yielding right-of-way in various situations
defensePoints: Other driver was not in hazardous proximity

followingTooClose.title: Tailgating
followingTooClose.description: Requirements for maintaining safe following distance

failureToSignal.title: Signals for turning and stopping
failureToSignal.description: Requirements for turn and stop signals
defensePoints: Signal was given but not observed
Turn was not required in that location
Other drivers were aware of intentions

runningRedLight.title: Traffic signals
defensePoints: Light was yellow when entering intersection

stopSign.title: Obedience to stop signs
stopSign.description: Requirements for stopping at stop signs

equipmentViolation.title: Equipment violations
defensePoints: Equipment was functioning at time of stop

pointSystem.description: New Jersey Point System for Moving Violations

pointReduction.description: Points can be reduced through safe driving and defensive driving courses
pointReduction.defensiveDriving: 2 points deducted for completing approved course

generalProcedures.contestTimeline: Generally must appear or respond by court date on summons
courtOptions: Plea to unsafe driving (39:4-97.2) if eligible
generalProcedures.mandatoryCourtAppearanceNote: New Jersey requires mandatory court appearances for many violations including speeding 20+ over in 65 zones, reckless driving, driving while suspended, and no insurance

unsafeDrivingStatute.description: NJ's unique plea bargain option that avoids points
limitations: Can only use twice in 5 years
Third offense within 5 years results in 4 points
